attributes.action: Legislate to impose a minimum five year custodial sentence...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Upon any person who, while driving a motor vehicle, knocks down a person and fails to stop and further legislates to impose a ten year custodial sentence if the consequent injuries result in the death of the victim.
As the present law does not impose sufficient penalties in some cases where death or serious injury has occurred as a result of a road traffic accident.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Legislate to impose a minimum five year custodial sentence..."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12193.asp

Prime Minister's Office
